member_organisations: Als openbare instelling levert FIT diensten aan alle Vlaamse KMO's met plannen voor internationalisatie. Geen lidmaatschap is vereist om dienstverlening te ontvangen. Jaarlijks verwerkt FIT duizenden vragen van Vlaamse bdrijven.
fields_of_interest: Trade, International co-operation and development, Customs, Business and Industry, Single market, Research and innovation, External Relations
eu_initiatives:
All EU programs focused on the internationalisation of SME's.  
EEAS future economic diplomacy strategy.
section: VI - Organisations representing local, regional and municipal authorities, other public or mixed entities, etc.
goals__remit:
Flanders Investment & Trade (FIT) is an organisation of the Government of Flanders, Belgium, in charge of trade - and investment promotion.  
FIT supports Flemish SME's with their internationalisation plans.  
FIT has a network of 90 offices worldwide to support Flemish SME's with their questions on exporting to and setting up in foreign markets inside and outside of the EU.  
Every year, many trade missions, trade fair participations, seminars, contact days, B2B visitor programs, buyers missions and other activities are organised to open up new markets for the Flemish SME's. 
FIT also attracts foreign investment into Flanders, Belgium.
relevant_communication: All EU programs focused on the internationalisation of SME's.
